title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: This elegant spear embodies both beauty and lethality, crafted from a gleaming silver-hued metal that glimmers in the light. Its elongated shaft is meticulously designed, featuring intricate engravings that tell the tale of ancient warriors. The spearhead is shaped like a razor-sharp arrow, perfect for piercing through armor and striking foes from a distance. A prominent gemstone adorns the base of the spearhead, emanating a subtle glow that suggests magical properties. Whether wielded by a skilled fighter or displayed as a trophy, this spear serves as a symbol of strength, precision, and craftsmanship in any adventurous realm.
